![Showcase image](resources/crimsonmoon.png)

Every so often... a Crimson Moon appears, accompanied by the howls of mobs across the lands. This is the continuation of Draylar's original [Crimson Moon](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/crimson-moon) mod, ported to Minecraft 1.17+ and with the (in my opinion) superfluous items removed.

[<img src="https://i.imgur.com/Ol1Tcf8.png" alt="Requires Fabric API" width="170"/>](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/fabric-api)

<br>

Crimson Moon is a mod based on the popular [Blood Moon](https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Blood_Moon). Every 20 nights, a Crimson Moon will spawn, which is accompanied by an increase in mob spawn rates and more dangerous foes.

This mod was built for Fabric. Forge ports are theoretically possible, but I won't do it unless Cardinal Components and Satin API are also made available for Forge.


## Configuration
Crimson Moon has a number of config options which you can edit in `config/crimsonmoon.json5`. Each option has a comment that describes what it does.
